If you’re ready, please go ahead and submit a formal application and include your most relevant experience highlights in the note.

3) Evidence of impact: Delivered changes that improved throughput and reduced cycle time (measurable improvement vs. baseline) and increased on-time delivery by tightening prioritization and removing bottlenecks.

Company_C is my first choice, and if we’re aligned on fit I’m ready to move quickly through next steps. Thank you for your consideration.

Hi Company_C—thank you. As requested for backup consideration, here are concise baseline → result metrics bullets, plus a link to a 1-page decision memo PDF.

Baseline → result (3–5 bullets):
- Workflow cycle time: 12.4 days → 8.1 days (-35%) after redesigning intake + prioritization and shipping an MVP in 3 weeks.
- On-time delivery: 62% → 85% (+23 pts) by clarifying owners, adding lightweight weekly status + risk review, and removing two recurring bottlenecks.
- Stakeholder alignment: approval turnaround 5.0 days → 2.7 days (-46%) after introducing a one-page decision memo format (options/tradeoffs/decision/DRI).
- Throughput: completed work items +18% over 6 weeks by tightening WIP limits and improving cross-team handoffs.

1-page decision memo (PDF): [link]

If your top options don’t work out or timing shifts, I can move quickly and am happy to jump into next steps immediately.

Hi Seeker_E—thanks for staying in touch, and appreciate you being ready to move quickly.

Thanks again—Company_C remains my first choice.
